description: Standardize HTML structure in docs pages
context:
Beads description:
Standardize the HTML structure in src/routes/utilities/+page.svelte and other docs pages. Current issues:
- Inconsistent use of section wrappers (some sections have .stack, some don't)
- Inconsistent heading hierarchy (h2.heading for major sections, but h3/h4 structure varies)
- Some sections nested inside other sections unnecessarily
- Missing section wrappers around some content blocks

Goal: Create a consistent pattern for all doc pages with proper section > heading > content structure.
